item.value: select a.Id as AppClass_Id,a.AppClass_Name,COUNT(1) as App_Count from WJ_T_AppClass a left join WJ_T_AppLog b on a.Id = b.AppLog_AppClassId group by a.Id,a.AppClass_Name

SELECT a.Id as AppClass_Id,a.AppClass_Name,COUNT(b.Id) AS App_Count FROM dbo.WJ_T_AppClass AS a LEFT JOIN dbo.WJ_T_App AS b ON a.Id = b.AppClassId AND a.AppClass_State = 1 AND b.App_State != 30 GROUP BY a.Id, a.AppClass_Name
